skillTree.name: Speed of Asuryan
skillTree.description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.

skillTree.name: Valour of Ages
skillTree.description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Attribute: Immune to Psychology when fighting against Dark Elves

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -15% when increasing
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

skillTree.name: Teacher of Sorcery
skillTree.description: These days Belannaer sits in the White Tower and reflects upon a lifetime of study. He is painfully aware that his duties have not yet ended. He senses that a greater challenge lies ahead, and that his powers will be sorely tested before he is allowed to find peace.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +1 for Mages
	(all provinces)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Mages
	(all provinces)

skillTree.name: Lord of Wisdom
skillTree.description: Those who seek wisdom in Saphery will find it. Those who seek power for power's sake are never seen again.

skillTree.name: Winds of Saphery
skillTree.description: The Kingdom of Saphery is an enchanted land, with skies that shine with all the colours of the rainbow, hills that move by night and warm rivers that glow with gentle light. Magic courses through the blood of Sapherian Elves, and all of the realm's princes are also mages of awesome power.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +15% when increasing
	(armies in local province)
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for all spells

skillTree.name: Guiding the Youth
skillTree.description: Belannaer has became a great mage and a teacher of sorcery to true seekers of knowledge. As a frail youth Teclis himself studied at the feet of Belannaer, absorbing and eventually coming to surpass his master's knowledge.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(armies in local province)

skillTree.name: The Oldest Loremaster
skillTree.description: Belannaer is the oldest living Loremaster of Hoeth, second only in power to the Warden of the White Tower, High Loremaster Teclis himself.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -15% when increasing
	(local region)

ui_effects.description: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.name: The Path of Illumination
skillTree.description: It is rare to encounter two Loremasters who have trodden the same path to illumination. Even to an Elven mind, the realm of knowledge is a labyrinth, and none can explore all of its many chambers.

effects.description:
Unlocks Hero recruitment: Loremaster of Hoeth
	(all provinces)
Hero capacity: +1 for Loremasters of Hoeth
Hero recruit rank: +1 for Loremasters of Hoeth

Unlocks Hero recruitment: Loremaster of Hoeth
	(all provinces)
Hero capacity: +2 for Loremasters of Hoeth
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Loremasters of Hoeth

skillTree.name: Blades of Saphery
skillTree.description: When Ulthuan marches to war, none go more eagerly than the Swordsmasters of Hoeth, for only in war can they truly unleash the full extent of their deadly art.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +12% for embedded Loremaster of Hoeth Heroes and Swordmasters of Hoeth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for embedded Loremaster of Hoeth Heroes and Swordmasters of Hoeth units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 10% for embedded Loremaster of Hoeth Heroes and Swordmasters of Hoeth units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Master of Battle
skillTree.description: Belannaer has studied warfare and personal combat for centuries now. It is said that he can slay a foe with but a touch, or kill with a single precisely-pitched whistle.

skillTree.name: A Web of Death
skillTree.description: Amongst his many tasks he gathers information from the Sword Masters who roam the lands of Ulthuan, searching out Dark Elf spies and uncovering their destructive plots. When the enemies of the White Tower strike he will be ready, and the Sword Masters shall accompany him as they march to do battle.

skillTree.name: Warden of Saphery
skillTree.description: At the time when the Norse began raiding Ulthuan in earnest Belannaer was one of the wizards whose magic shrouded the coast of Ulthuan in a maze of spells, making it almost impossible for raiders to reach the Elven Kingdoms.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 when in own or allied territory
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 when in own or allied territory
	(Lord's army)
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Searing Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Searing Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Searing Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earth Blood
skillTree.description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Earth Blood"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Earth Blood Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Pann's Impenetrable Pelt
skillTree.description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Withering
skillTree.description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Withering"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Withering Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Withering Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Flame Storm"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Flame Storm Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flame Storm Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Arcane Unforging"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Arcane Unforging Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Arcane Unforging Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Life Bloom
skillTree.description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.

skillTree.name: Wild Heart
skillTree.description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Militia Master
skillTree.description: Turning an untrained bunch of regular citizens into effective fighting units requires a special kind of talent, and oodles of patience.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bow Master
skillTree.description: Missile combat isn't always about attacking; knowing how to defend also pays dividends.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cavalry Master
skillTree.description: Years of experience in mounted combat has started to pay off; this one is always in command of both their force and its steeds.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +7% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Ellyrian Reavers units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Ellyrian Reavers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Vanguard Master
skillTree.description: Being present at the very forefront of the assault, on many occasions, prepares one for future engagements of a similar nature.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +9% for Tiranoc Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Tiranoc Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sky Master
skillTree.description: The firmament holds no fear for this one, such is their command of the many airborne beasts of battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Master Strategist
skillTree.description: Knowing that it is the rare plan that survives contact with the enemy, yet being prepared for all eventualities, raises this one above mere planners.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Immovable Force
skillTree.description: Like a wall of the hardest stone imaginable - such is their ability to withstand attack.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Favourable Winds
skillTree.description: When the gale always blows in the direction of your choosing, failure becomes a rare event indeed.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Archers and Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Silver Torrent
skillTree.description: Speed, agility and control - all must be mastered if your crushing tide is to break perfectly upon enemy shores.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Heart of the Flame
skillTree.description: The very centre of the fire always burns the hottest.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Great Warrior
skillTree.description: "Let your name be on the lips of every man and woman; your great deeds go before you!"

skillTree.name: Divine Strength
skillTree.description: Sickness must be purged, and purge it shall be!

effects.description:
Construction cost: -5% for Worship buildings
	(all provinces)

Construction cost: -10% for Worship buildings
	(all provinces)

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Elven Healing
skillTree.description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Elven Scholar
skillTree.description: Far removed from the petty squabbles of other races, many High Elves are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Archmage of Saphery
backgroundSkills.description: "Enlightenment is achieved by mastering not only the body, but the soul. Only then can a warrior truly understand the value of life and why it should be protected at all costs."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -30% for Swordmasters of Hoeth units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +10 for Swordmasters of Hoeth units
	(Lord's army)
Diplomatic relations: +20 with Humans and High Elves

items.name: Cloak of Stars
items.description: The Loremaster of Hoeth wears an enchanted cloak. The runes woven into its fabric tell of the virtues of wisdom, patience and self-control. They warn that violence is not a path to wisdom. Those that attack the wearer of the cloak will feel the weight of the world resting ever heavier on them, and their blows lack strength and purpose.

ui_effects.description: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

items.name: The Book of the Phoenix
items.description: The Book of the Phoenix tells the ancient legend of Asuryan – an allegorical story of the fate of all civilizations, of birth, growth, glory, decline and eventual destruction. By reading one of the verses of the book, Belannaer may gain one of several effects, unless the book is destroyed or nullified by some means.
